name: TWOgether
description:
A dungeon escape room where you and your friend need to solve the riddles of the dugeon. Work together and escape. Along the way you will meet Stron, Gerto, Gerth and Er. They will help you trough the adventure. By the way don't just go stand on button, because if you push the wrong one you fail. The signs and buttons are the same, if you want to know if it's a sign or a button you need to press space close to one if you get a message it's a sign if you don't it's a button. You need to have a friend and discord for this. I wasn't able to implement voice chat so a discord call is going to do that.

Controls:

WASD: for walking

Spacebar if your close to a sign or a character.
